Concept Brief: D2C Subscription Startup

Scenario: A hypothetical brand offering monthly boxes for eco-friendly products.

Approach: MVP landing page, user interviews, A/B testing for subscription funnels.

Potential Results: Lower customer acquisition cost, data-driven bundling strategies.

Concept Brief: B2B Marketplace

Scenario: A platform connecting small businesses with wholesale suppliers.

Approach: Focus on user-friendly dashboard, secure transactions, and rating system for suppliers.

Potential Results: Increased trust and streamlined procurement processes.
